summary: Mage College MakeOver improves the looks of 9 different members of the Mage college that I thought needed to be changed and needed to look a lot better.
descriptionHtml:
[img] https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/48165848/PNP%20Maniacs/Mage%20College%20MakeOver.jpg [/img]

This is a mod that was made for my [url=http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLrysKOv6oktv4MYaf2MWgXMUmw-rA_5aE] Skyrim Lets Play Series[/url], by Ladylexyxox, that improves 9 members of the Mage College.  I noticed that some members of the Mage College looked ugly and I thought that they needed to have some improvements done.

[u][b]Requirements[/b][/u]

If you do not have these two mods loading before the Mage College Makeover in your load order you will get a CTD.

- ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_3
- ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_1

You can find them here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?] ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

[color=red][b]Note:[/b][/color] The ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full will not work.

[u][b]Optional[/b][/u]

These are the mods that have been used to take the pictures with and that I recommend you using in your Skyrim game alongside this mod.

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141/? ]High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/? ]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25211/? ]TairenSoul Female Face Tattoo Warpaint - TS Female Face Tattoos V3 - HI RES[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25791/?]TairenSoul Male Face Tattoo Warpaint - TS Male Face Tattoos V3 - HI RES [/url]

[u][b]My Skyrim Series[/b][/u]

If you want to see this mod in use then you can checkout my Skyrim Lets Play Series I am currently doing. [url=http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLrysKOv6oktv4MYaf2MWgXMUmw-rA_5aE]Find it here[/url]
author: Varience
